title: Undefined variable in syscall_unix
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
At install go1.0.3 and trunk version in NetBSD 6.0, it fails.

pkg/syscall
/home/neo/go/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_unix.go:122: undefined: signals
/home/neo/go/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_unix.go:123: undefined: signals
go tool dist: FAILED:
